ceoMessagePage.quote: “In 2022, GCB achieved remarkable growth of +31%, thus ensuring the company’s sustainability.”
ceoMessagePage.intro: The year 2022 marked a decisive turning point for GCB. Thanks to the synergy between strategy, bold decisions, and consistent efforts at all levels, our company recorded a remarkable +31% increase in revenue compared to 2021. This performance strengthens our position and ensures the company’s long-term sustainability.

partnership.title: Partnership as a Driver
partnership.content: Our vision of partnership was realized with the signing of a major contract in Alrar, in collaboration with Petrofac, where the national share represented nearly 37%. This orientation reflects our will to build strong relationships, share know-how, and open up to new opportunities both nationally and internationally.

industrialExcellence.title: Industrial Excellence
industrialExcellence.content: GCB stood out in manufacturing and mechanical construction, particularly through the commissioning of 38 scraper stations in the South-West. These achievements reflect our strategic investments and pave the way for an ambitious program in 2023.

strategicNeeds.title: Meeting Strategic Needs
strategicNeeds.content: We integrated the water injection activity through the “Provision of Water Injection Systems” project in the BRS field. At the same time, GCB took part in national emergency programs to secure drinking water supply, by building two desalination plants: one in Boumerdes (80,000 m³/day) and the other in Oran (300,000 m³/day).

environmentalCommitment.title: An Environmental Commitment
environmentalCommitment.content: Aware of global challenges, GCB actively contributes to environmental protection through the implementation of flare gas recovery projects. These initiatives help reduce CO₂ emissions and confirm our role as a responsible and sustainable actor.

quality.heading: A Certified Quality System Committed to Excellence
quality.paragraph: GCB is ISO 9001:2015 certified for its Quality Management System (QMS). We are committed to:
list: Providing services that comply with international standards.
Continuously improving our processes to satisfy clients and partners.
Motivating, training, and involving our employees.
Ensuring performance through cost control and traceability.

hse.heading: Health, Safety and Environment
hse.paragraph: GCB has implemented a management system certified to ISO 45001:2018 (Occupational Health & Safety) and ISO 14001:2015 (Environment). Our priorities:
list: Prevent risks and provide a safe environment.
Promote an active and participatory OH&S culture.
Improve energy performance and optimize waste management.
Comply with regulations and enhance our responsible image.
